When you use Uber, you trust us with your information. We are committed to keeping that trust. That starts with helping you understand our privacy practices.This policy describes the information we collect, how it is used and shared, and your choices regarding this information.

This policy applies to users of Uber's services anywhere in the world, including users of Uber's apps, websites, features or other services.This policy describes how Uber and its affiliates collect and use personal information to provide our services.
